name: Kid (tinu.io, leapero, Noiris)
description:
A collaboration of friends and the friendliest friends to create a game to participate in Game Jam 2020.

The theme of Game Jam 2020: Out of control

Name: Kid or คิด means kid and in Thai "think".

This game combines both of it. A young girl who always tries to plan ahead.

We decided for a game which reflects real life and packed it in something cute.
You planned a day, made a to-do-list, but it never turns out like how you wanted it?
This game is the same.
At first you can play the level, but it is just the plan.
When you are done, the reality kicks in and it just moves as you did in the thought process.
Buuuuuut....it doesn't work out as you planned it, because unexpected things happen. Life.

Because of the limited amount of time we were only able to build the Windows version. After the jam we created a WebGL version (exact the same) for everyone to enjoy: http://tinu.io/games/kid/
